function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and poor indoor air quality due to high CO2 levels","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory illnesses and transmission of airborne pathogens","Mitigation":"Regular ventilation checks and maintenance, installation of air regulators and CO2 monitors","Technologies":"CO2 monitors, air/temperature/humidity regulators","People":"Residents, occupants","Owner":"Building management, homeowners"},{"Description":"Transmission of pathogens through surfaces and high-touch areas","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases within residential complexes","Mitigation":"Implementation of touchless technologies and IoT to reduce surface contact, frequent sanitation and disinfection","Technologies":"Touchless technologies, IoT, self-cleaning materials","People":"Residents, visitors","Owner":"Building management, homeowners"},{"Description":"Inadequate sanitation and cleaning leading to potential disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and illness among residents and visitors","Mitigation":"Frequent and thorough sanitation, use of self-cleaning materials, education on proper cleaning practices","Technologies":"Self-cleaning materials, IoT for monitoring cleanliness","People":"Residents, cleaning services","Owner":"Building management, homeowners"}]}
